author: Wayne Collins
description: Wayne Collins, this drink's creator, originally used equal parts as is usual for a classic Negroni and after trying various other formulations we've found this works best. Wayne also specifies a grapefruit zest twist and this makes the drink. However, be warned, this is a drink for aficionados of bittersweet aperitifs and Suze. We love it!
name: White Negroni
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
30 ml Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)

recipeInstructions.text: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and STIR
